dct_title_s: A map of the Holy Land, and countries adjacent
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, islands off coast, travel routes, boundaries, places of historical interest.
"Engraved for the Works by Josephus" -- top center margin.
From G.H. Maynard's translation of the works of Flavius Josephus, published multiple times from 1792 to 1799.
